question: 1.As per IS:456, the value of shear strength of concrete (Ï„) is a function of -

answers.d: Both concrete grade and percentage of tension steel

question: 2.In a four pointing loading setup, which type of loading is middle part of the beam subjected to ?

answers.c: Both bending moment and shear force

question: 3.What type of cracks are observed in the beam portion subjected to shear force in the four-point loading test ?

4.Two rectangular reinforced concrete sections X and Y are similar in all aspects except the longitudinal tension reinforcement in section Y is 10% more. Which one of the following statements is correct ?

answers.a: Section X has more shear strength
answers.b: Section Y has more shear strength
answers.c: Section X and Y have equal shear strength
answers.d: Cannot conclude with the given data
